title: Slow batch requests
body:
Noticed that Erigon serves batch requests much slower than OpenEthereum.
Curl requests 200 eth_getTransactionReceipt in a batch, OE takes:
```
real    0m0.111s
user    0m0.004s
sys    0m0.012s
```
 same curl on Erigon:
```
real    0m18.035s
user    0m0.011s
sys    0m0.005s
```
Request to test with:
```
curl --data '[{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x47e9145d53d59d7839fefcef32fb09d58e3cb1ed17654aee64894c30b662d292"],"id":1220219},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0xa457498fc86d496f2a44392e4e228b066f050f67e763f9340f5d906f6b782cee"],"id":1220220},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x74c04f9ad1b0c58ecd93dcf346bd61dd79ae13dd0e798f58286a61e3ae50076c"],"id":1220221},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x679b078ef584ea1f223ed8c0b8a9193b550253179c7e9122b80aca4a7c20c5cf"],"id":1220222},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x4f774a872d111a2c5acab38d0db3bfeee33866c95b08c8add0fd7fbbcecb020d"],"id":1220223},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x0aa64f625915110c6e950d8762c42fb7b9fe332e552cdec36ef7c223db1f35d6"],"id":1220224},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0xa8bb75adb2fbf42f7db89cf5b81a4f34f8516ec7d316e912f142ea0b16650dba"],"id":1220225},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0xa068ddfbbfcfbaa75e242f4fce5df6f7f49a80075a7403fd62039226c287fba0"],"id":1220226},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x66399f7b07c0d1c11fc5e741d295308e9cd1c158057780e7526ab6d6bbaa46ed"],"id":1220227},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x2d08ffab9e83781da6247d0fb13abde7defec520bca6951eb28b426f978d76a6"],"id":1220228},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0xaa43d3086fefe993d7192a30b908173a07a67f3c059c36f5015980148bb72de4"],"id":1220229},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x14f0a2386e3a723b3f918fa6b2ce7e439409f8a0427a1e3d0ef3373770fd379f"],"id":1220230},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x000c95b8cbc69a05e1e402ed18d63472f228d009a176a7dc7bd1aebeba73bd5d"],"id":1220231},{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x71255d6 OE node - Linux container, 32cpu, 64GB 
Erigon node - VM (KVM), 64vcpu, 64GB
Both using gen4 nvme on ZFS
Erigon compiled locally, no docker in use

```
OE
real    0m0.062s
user    0m0.009s
sys     0m0.000s

Erigon

@AskAlexSharov should I close this Issue or will try to find a solution for docker?

Now it's much better, but slower than bare metal
```
real	0m0.848s
user	0m0.006s
sys	0m0.009s
```

@akme `rpcdaemon_batch3` merged to devel and will include in next release (every Thursday)
Check please if this gives "enough" performance for you (we executing your batches of 200 request on 50 goroutines - to limit impact of 1 client to other clients - so 1 user can't affect experience/latency of others by sending 1 huge batch) - if not we can change some default settings or give for you cli parameter to tune it for your case.
closing for now. feel free to re-open if it's not fast enough
